about_the_game: Try out the exciting high-scoring gameplay of Astral Gunners in this demo. Players have access to play as Light Gunner, Blue Gunner and Red Gunner on Light World. Bring a friend along with co-op gameplay.
detailed_description: Try out the exciting high-scoring gameplay of Astral Gunners in this demo. Players have access to play as Light Gunner, Blue Gunner and Red Gunner on Light World. Bring a friend along with co-op gameplay.
name: Astral Gunners Demo
short_description: Get ready to push your skills to the limit against an endless sea of bullets and evil robots in Astral Gunners. Choose from five different gunners to master in this horizontal shooter. With the ability to dodge, reflect, delete, and convert bullets you are more powerful than you might believe.
